ModMetaData.name: Crystal Bodyparts (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by FantasyFan https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1941242146 If the original author requests it, I will remove this update.
--
Now uses [SYR] Processor Framework
Supports "A Dog Said... Animal Prosthetics" https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=746425621
Supports "Elite Bionic Framework" https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1665403571
Supports "TMaterials - Glass" https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2845463213
--
Original mod notes (1.1):
Have you ever wanted to create better prosthetics in medieval times. Now you can.
This mod adds ten different bodyparts: -Crystal Leg (like Bionic Leg) -Crystal Arm (like Bionic Arm) -Crystal Eye (like Bionic Eye) -Crystal Ear (like Bionic Ear) -Crystal Heart (like Bionic Heart) -Crystal Spine (like Bionic Spine) -Crystal Jaw -Crystal Liver -Crystal Kidney -Crystal Lung
This mod adds four advanced bodyparts: -Adv. Crystal Leg (like Archotech Leg) -Adv. Crystal Arm (like Archotech Arm) -Adv. Crystal Eye (like Archotech Eye) -Adv. Crystal Ear (like Archotech Ear)
Two new different workbenches: -Crystal Growth Station -Adv. Crystal Growth Station
Two research projects
Two new ores: -Blue crystal -Purple crystal
With "A Dog Said":
This mod adds thirteen animal bodyparts: -Animal Crystal Leg -Animal Crystal Arm -Animal Crystal Eye -Animal Crystal Ear -Animal Crystal Heart -Animal Crystal Spine -Animal Crystal Stomach -Animal Crystal Jaw -Animal Crystal Liver -Animal Crystal Kidney -Animal Crystal Lung -Animal Crystal Nose -Animal Crystal Tail
Workbench: -Animal Crystal Growth Station
New ore: -Green crystal
Can be safely added to existing saves.
If you find things unbalanced, please make suggestions for improvement.
